dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions[type].comparator
dt-option.summary: Define the comparison function for the condition

type.description: The function that is used when filtering the DataTable.

dt-option.description:
This function is what the condition uses to filter the table. It takes two parameters.
* `value` the value that is present in the DataTable. * `comparison` an array of values, with each index representing the number of value input that the `value` is to be filtered against.
This function is to return a boolean, true if the row is to be included in the result, false if not.

example.title: Include the row if it equals the selected value
